help:
Get help on a command or specific command.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds per channel.
info:
Get info on the bot and its owner.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds per channel.
invite:
Invite AidanBot to your server!

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds per channel.
role:
Get any role that starts with [r]
Users with `manage_roles` permission can add and remove any role below their top.

Cooldown: 3 per 30 seconds per user.
echo:
Make me say something.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per channel.
react:
Make me react to a message.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per channel.
rate:
I'll rate something, all my opinions are fact.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per user.
ask:
Got a question? AidanBot will answer it, it'll probably be wrong tho.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per user.
percent:
What percentage of something is you?

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per user.
decide:
I'll pick a random result of given options.

Cooldown: 1 per 3 seconds per user.
clone:
Make a user say anything you want.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per user.
embed: Create a fancy embed. User {prefix}embedhelp for more info!
fight:
Fight someone or set 2 others up to fight to the death!!

Cooldown: 1 per 30 seconds per channel.
rps:
Classic game of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per channel.
slowmode: Set the slowmode of the channel or thread.
ban: Bans a given member and can delete a certon days worth of messages.
clear: Purges a set of messages in a channel or thread.
emoteify:
Create an emote from an image that you can use in the server with NQN.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds per channel.
addcommand:
Adds a custom command.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per guild.
removecommand:
Removes a custom command.

Cooldown: 1 per 6 seconds per guild.
allcommands:
Returns a list of all custom commands.

Cooldown: 1 per 3 seconds per guild.
qotdadd:
Submit Question.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds per user.
qotdget:
Get All Questions.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds per user.
sleep: Puts me to sleep, i wont listen to any command.
wake: Wakes me up, allows me to listen to commands.
